question: In which district of Maharashtra, theÂ  first child-friendly police station was recently inaugurated?
explanation: Pune City Police started the 'Balsnehi police station' on the premises of the Lashkar police station in Pune Camp. This police station was jointly inaugurated by Kanpur IIT Director Abhay Karandikar, Pune Police commissioner Amitabh Gupta, Joint Commissioner of police Ravindra Shisave, and CEO of Hope for Children Foundation, Caroline Audior De Valter.
